description: Steamed eggplant, bathed in our exquisite seasoning. Served alongside our famous Queso Caldera, local smoked tomato salsa & handmade tortillas, made each morning.
Oak grilled ribeye. Susictly marrinated in Mezcal Chipotle au Poivre. Served with crispy red potatos, rajas & handmade tortillas, made each morning.
Our exquisite mix of Fennel-Quesillo Salsa & Longaniza. Served with a pickled fennel & handmade tortillas, made each morning.
Pan-seared to perfection fluke, dressed in peanut Mole. Served alongside potato hashbrown & fried herbs. Includes, your choice of vanilla, strawberry or chocolate yogurt.
24 hour marinated & grilled goat loin. Served with cilantro salad, salsa cruda & handmade tortillas, made each morning.
Chile smoked exquisitely trumpet mushroom, dressed in Mole de Hongo. Server with fried pickled mushrooms & handmade tortillas, made each morning.
Hand-roasted sweet corn con Requeson. Served with corn nuts, masa ash & Mole verde.
3 tacos with Confit brisket, Black Magic oil, avocado, onion y cilantro. Made with handmade tortillas, made each morning.
